description: Observation to London Borough of Hackney. Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment (England and Wales) 1999 (SI 1999 No.293) Environmental Statement accompanying planning application for the demolition of existing buildings on site (excluding 5-9 Sun Street (bar rear elements) and construction within eastern part of the site of a 2 basement plus part eleven, part twelve, part seventeen, part twenty, part twenty one, part twenty four storey (129.67 metres high) office building providing 52,449sqm of use Class B1 and 320 sqm of flexible retail/office (Use Class A1, A2, A3, A4 and B1) floor space, plus the refurbishment of 5-9 Sun Street within the western part of the site and construction of ground plus three storey terrace for 649sqm flexible retail/office uses (Use Class A1, A2, A3, A4 and B1) at ground floor level, with 1373sqm office (Use Class B1) above; together with the provision of vehicular access, 5 disabled car parking spaces, and 220 cycle spaces off Earl Street, works of hard and soft landscaping and enabling works associated with the development.
